list.name: Changes
list.comment:
building the basis for a turned based text-based game, but I need to implement stacks. the cooldowns will help since I can add the skills to a list and i can use peek(); to see if the previous skill is still on cooldown, but I need to use push and .isEmpty(); maybe i can implement in moving around the map
9/14/2024: Setting up monster and player skills implemented interfaces for modularity, each skill is responsible for its own methods leading to more robust skills added to other base classes, but nothing notable currently building combat logic to stack skills for cooldown need to implement peek(): will implement REDO ATTACK DEFEND SKILL EQUIP will need to place skills into an array that I can select from will work on weapons class next which will add buffs to player attributes based off item TODO: need to build simple map and use stack logic to move from one area to the next need to create random encounters need to finish weapons class need to create equipment need to create action list??
stopping for the night finished basic combat, but it is still broken
worked on movement and setting up for special events need to build special events created run function but need to make better can look at a map to see where player it
combat is less broken need to fix issue with monster attacking multiple times, and if I use the other code I exit right after I attack
fixed the issue of re-instantiating player a second time when maze is created
currently runs, but I am facing issues where turns will still execute even after death. need to still refactor turn-based fight logic.
refactored the turn-based logic, able to implement random encounters, flushed out classes implementing logging
added monsters and bosses, fixed repeating special event logic, fixed special events, maybe implement leveling up or just increase stats for the time being
working
added search items, added better random logic fixed class cast exception error, created weapons, items, special boss, need to flush out story need to add to PlayerActions equip and unequipped methods there are issues where I can access rooms that were not accessible before, but i never changed the movement logic so why is this?? did a bunch of stuff, but I need to polish this game
MOVEMENT now kind of broken will pull new branch and debug
11/4 where is this updating to? if this breaks, then revert to the previous
updating commit to GitHub
11/22 starting Final due 12/6 PrimaryBranchTEST
11/28 refactored map to add additional rooms need to add logic to bring in JSON file and display the map now
JSON is loaded properly, need to clean up the classes associated currently working on turn-based combat then I will build the exp and leveling system after this I will work on adjusting turn based on cooldowns and skills will work on save/load finalize with easy stuff like music
working on save state and changing interfaces to parent classes
save load working trying to refactor to make more sense,
